wordGroup: greenhouse gas n. 二氧化碳、甲烷等导致温室效应的气体

sentences.en: It sets targets for reduction of greenhouse-gas emissions.
sentences.cn: 它为减少温室气体排放设立了目标。

sentences.en: The specific impact of the greenhouse effect is unknowable.
sentences.cn: 温室效应的具体影响尚不可知。

sentences.en: First, there was the greenhouse gas solution.
sentences.cn: 首先是温室气体的解决方案。
